alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 12:33PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong winds will cause brief whiteout conditions on portions of SR229... Strong to very strong northwest winds will continue through the early afternoon hours along State Route 229. These winds, with gusts up to 65 mph, will be possible. The winds may cause brief white out conditions along with strong cross winds. High profile vehicles may be unstable to drive along SR 229 and snow showers could cause rapid visibility reductions to one mile or less. A wind advisory remains in effect for these areas until 9pm tonight. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County
